img_above_text:
![Wukong Longevity 16.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/cc/Wukong_Longevity_16.jpg)
Once you have the vine, take the upper path back toward the Longevity Road Shrine, where you'll encounter a two Crow Diviners - one up on a ledge to lure you, and a friend hiding in the bushes nearby.
img_below_text:
The most important note is that you can find another Dark-faced Overlord here. Keep focusing on battering his legs to get him to fall and you can attack his skull, and when he dies he'll drop the Gold Spikeplate Curio!
![Wukong Longevity 18.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/89/Wukong_Longevity_18.jpg)
summary_promot:

Once you have the vine, take the upper path back toward the Longevity Road Shrine, where you'll encounter a two Crow Diviners - one up on a ledge to lure you, and a friend hiding in the bushes nearby."
        - Following Text: "The most important note is that you can find another Dark-faced Overlord here. Keep focusing on battering his legs to get him to fall and you can attack his skull, and when he dies he'll drop the Gold Spikeplate Curio!
![Wukong Longevity 18.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/89/Wukong_Longevity_18.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a snowy forest setting in *Black Myth: Wukong*, showcasing the player character approaching a towering enemy, likely the "Dark-faced Overlord" mentioned in the following text. The player appears prepared for combat, with health, stamina, and abilities displayed in the interface. This scene aligns with the guide's description of battling the Overlord by targeting its legs to make it fall, enabling attacks on its skull.
